title: Interpretation of seeing a gift for an unmarried woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a gift for a single woman in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, a gift pleases people a lot, as it is a way to express love and care. The future, in fact there are many interpretations that reflect the same meaning. Interpretation of dreams. In this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a gift for an unmarried woman in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a gift in a dream. A gift in a dream carries the meaning of good news and surprise for the dreamer and evidence On a lot of good and abundant money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is giving a gift to another person in the dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will create problems in his life. Whoever sees in his dream that he is someone he did not know before, and he gave him a beautiful gift, then this dream indicates that the dreamer He will reap good luck and abundant money, God willing. Whoever sees in his dream that he is giving many gifts to someone, this is evidence that the dreamer is a person who wants to fulfill all his desires in life. Whoever sees in his dream that he is receiving many gifts from a group of people, This is evidence that the dreamer is a good person and loved by his family and relatives. Whoever sees in his dream a large amount of beautiful gifts, this is a warning from God to the dreamer to pay attention to all the matters of his life and fulfill all his desires. Whoever sees in his dream that someone has given you a gift and you opened it, but you did not You like the gift, then this is evidence that the dreamer will deceive those he knows. Whoever sees in his dream that he received a gift and the gift was (a book), then this is evidence to me of why the dreamer received good and enjoyable news from someone he knows. And whoever sees in his dream that he received a gift, which is chocolate This is evidence that the dreamer will have a very successful business and a job from which he will earn a lot of money and livelihood (and God knows best). Interpretation of the dream of seeing a gift in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said about the gift in the dream that he is a good person and indicates kindness and tenderness and is an indication of goodness. The dreamer and the satisfaction of his desires. As for the gift of gold in the dream, it indicates good news and that the dreamer will give him a lot of money and great support. The perfume in the dream is in the form of a gift, and this is evidence of the good things that people say about the dreamer. However, if the perfume bottle breaks, this is something that is not Desirable and indicates that there are those who speak ill of the dreamer about his honor and value. While the Holy Qur’an in a dream is one of the most beautiful gifts in dreams and reality. This dream shows that something happy will happen, that God has separated him from sin and immorality, and that God, Blessed and Most High, has chosen for him The path of goodness (and God knows best). Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gift for a single woman: A gift in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the approach of her marriage and also indicates the great goodness that will come her way. And whoever sees in her dream that someone she knows gave her a beautiful gift, and this person is young and single, then this dream It indicates that this young man wants to marry her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gift for a married woman in a dream: A gift in a dream for a married woman with good news, and if she does not have children, may God bless her and her children. It also indicates ample and great provision for her family.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about crying for help in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about crying for help: The dreamer often sees in a dream that he is screaming and begging others to help him get out of the predicament and problem he faces, but what is the interpretation of this symbol? What will return to the dreamer after interpretation? This is good, and we bring him good or bad news, give him advice, and make him resort to it. All of this we will explain in this article through the largest possible number of cases related to the vision of crying for help, as well as the sayings and sayings of major scholars in the field of dream interpretation, such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about crying Asking for help: One of the symbols that carries many connotations and signs is the cry of distress in a dream, and through the following cases we will learn about it: Screaming for help in a dream indicates the collapse of the dreamer’s worries and sorrows and the enjoyment of a calm and stable life. Seeing him screaming for help in a dream indicates the good luck that he will have. The dreamer has it in his life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is screaming for help and assistance, this symbolizes the end of disputes and hostility between him and those close to him. Interpretation of the dream of crying as a call for help by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin dealt with the vision of crying in a dream, and the following are some of the interpretations he received: The dreamer Whoever sees in a dream that he is screaming and crying shows his ability to achieve his ambitions and dreams and reach his goal. The dream of crying for help in a dream shows Ibn Sirin the happiness and comfort that he feels in his life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is screaming for help, this symbolizes his strong personality and wisdom. In behavior and the balance of things. Interpretation of a dream about crying for help by Ibn Shaheen. Calling for help in a dream is one of the visions mentioned by Ibn Shaheen and we present some of his opinions as follows: Screaming for help in a dream, according to Ibn Shaheen, indicates that the dreamer’s situation will change for the better and move to a high standard of living. Seeing her screaming and being depressed in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve his goals and the success that he sought so much. Interpretation of a dream of a single person screaming. The interpretation of a cry of distress in a dream varies depending on the social status of the dreamer, and the following is the interpretation of the unmarried girl who sees this symbol: The unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is screaming Seeking help shows that she has overcome the difficulties and obstacles that prevented her from succeeding in her work. Screaming for help in an unmarried woman’s dream means that joys and happy occasions will come soon. Seeing a single woman screaming for help shows her wisdom and moderation of mind, which makes her a source of confidence. Interpretation of dreams about asking for help From someone I know to single people. An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is asking for help from someone she knows is a sign of her separation from her lover due to the many disagreements and quarrels that occur between them. Seeing the help of a familiar person in a dream for a single woman indicates her bad psychological state and her need for help, which is reflected in In her dreams, she must rely on God, pray and get close to Him. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman screaming in a dream: A married woman

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing black ants in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing black ants in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Many people try to find an explanation for their calls and dreams during sleep. Interpretations vary according to the condition of the person who saw the dream in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing black ants in a dream according to Al-NabulsiInterpretation of a dream about seeing black ants in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi, that the dream in which a person sees black ants has many connotations, and among the most famous of these interpreters is those who dream about Al-Nabulsi, and among these interpretations If a person dreams that ants are walking on his body, this means that the person has many children. But if a person sees in a dream that ants are on his head and body together, this is an indication that the person is sick. Seeing black ants in a dream indicates that the person who The dream saw a sick person with a very serious illness. Among these interpretations is that if a person sees a black growth in a dream, this indicates that the person is preoccupied with trivial matters of life. Interpretation of seeing black ants for a married woman Seeing black ants in a dream for a married woman has many interpretations and explanations, such as: If a married woman sees black growths in a dream, this indicates that most of her offspring will be male. But if a married woman sees red ants in her dream, this indicates that she has many enemies. It indicates that a woman sees ants carrying children. Ibn Sirin is one of the most famous interpreters of dreams and dreams, and here we write for you some interpretations of Ibn Sirin who sees black ants in a dream: Seeing ants in a dream means profit of all kinds for the person who saw the dream. If one sees black ants filling the house, this indicates a wonderful future for the one who saw the dream. But if a person sees black ants in general, this is a sign of overcoming all life’s difficulties. Seeing black ants in a dream also indicates that the person He will earn a lot of money. Interpretation of dreams about seeing black ants in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Dreaming in a dream is one of the things that many people are looking for an interpretation of. There is more than one world for interpreting dreams, including where you will see Al-Nabulsi. Interpretations related to seeing black ants in a dream vary depending on the dreamer’s condition or the dream and vision. Ants in general are good things and the next good thing for the dreamer.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete sage in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with an interpretation of seeing a complete wisdom tooth in a dream, but seeing the appearance of a new wisdom tooth in a complete dream has many indicators and can most likely indicate the birth of a new child in the family, but seeing the complete extraction of a tooth in a dream does not deserve praise in many visions. . It is normal for one to see in a dream a strange and unrealistic dream that many interpreters may not be able to interpret, and we have collected it for you and compiled it for you Raed. And here is the interpretation written, dear followers, the interpretation of seeing a wisdom tooth in a dream, complete with a bowl, for married people, pregnant women, and men. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin seeing a wise man in a dream? For a person in a dream, a new tooth appears, and this indicates the emergence of something new in the dreamer’s life But if a married woman sees a new tooth in her dream or the placement of a new molar, this means that she will become pregnant soon. Likewise, if a man sees completely new teeth in a dream, then this vision is good for the new baby, God willing. Having wisdom teeth removed in a dream is a sign of repayment. Debts, a better life, and the search for a job. The complete interpretation of seeing wisdom teeth in a dream for an ordinary woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the appearance of a new tooth, this indicates that her dreams and aspirations will come true. Also, seeing a woman’s wisdom teeth indicates her close marriage to someone she loves and shows her tremendous strength. In fact, the appearance of a molar in an unmarried girl’s dream or its extraction indicates a malignant disease that leads to death. Interpretation of seeing a wise man in a full dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams of her teeth being extracted, this means that she will live a long time until she loses her teeth. But if she sees that it strengthens the molars This is a sign of immorality, sins, and many sins. Seeing a married woman’s wisdom teeth indicates that she will soon become pregnant, her husband’s participation in work, and her ability to access capital. Interpretation of seeing complete wisdom teeth in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is removing her husband’s tooth. This indicates her disobedience to her husband. Likewise, if a married woman dreams that she has reached a wisdom tooth, this is evidence of easy childbirth. And whoever sees in her dream that her teeth are falling out and falling out, this indicates the death of her husband and all her relatives. Indeed, a pregnant woman’s dream of wisdom teeth is evidence of her upbringing and flogging. Which the girl will give birth to. Interpretation of seeing wisdom teeth in a complete dream for a man. If a man sees in a complete dream that he is fitting a new molar, this indicates the payment of his debts and indicates his ample living. But if a man sees in a dream completely new teeth, this means that he will marry the girl of his dreams and join a job New. Also, seeing a wise man coming out in a dream means disobedience, sins, and bad deeds for the dreamer, and God knows best. Indeed, seeing a wisdom tooth cracked in a married man’s dream means that his wife is pregnant, which promises him a baby girl. A wise man falls in a dream. Whoever dreams of having his tooth extracted completely without pain, this Evidence of the death of a relative and the loss of his money and pension. Also, seeing a new tooth emerge for someone indicates a new life.

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about urinating a lot

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about urinating a lot: Seeing urine is one of the things that causes us anxiety and discomfort. As for dreams, are their interpretations good or evil? This is what we will explain through this article so that the sleeper’s heart will calm down and not be distracted between the many different indicators and interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about urinating frequently. Many of the most important interpretive scholars have said that seeing frequent urination in a dream is an unwanted dream that indicates the appearance of many unwanted and repulsive things in the dream. The life of the dreamer warns him that he will receive many bad deeds. Events in the coming periods. While if a person sees that he is urinating profusely during his sleep, this is a sign that God will open great doors for him to earn livelihood that will greatly improve his financial and social situation in the coming periods. But if the dreamer is a merchant and sees in his dream that he is urinating a lot This means that he will enter into many failed projects that will lead him to a great loss. However, many of the most important interpretation experts have confirmed that seeing frequent urination in general in the dreamer’s dream indicates that he is suffering from many major problems and crises in his life that are difficult for him to find. A solution for it. Interpretation of a dream about frequent urination by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing many nails in a dream indicates that the dreamer is trying to get rid of all his bad habits that make many people stay away from him. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing frequent urination in a dream The dreamer indicates that he is a weak person who cannot solve the problems of his life and does not make important decisions without referring to the people in his life. Frequent urination during sleep indicates that he is a person who does not respect God in his home or work and needs reform so that God does not punish him severely. Asrar website for interpretation Al-Ahlam is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: A website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of dreams about urinating a lot for a single woman. Many leading experts in interpretation have confirmed that seeing a single woman urinating a lot in a dream means that she does not want to Someone interferes in her life and does not control her thinking. Also, frequent urination during a girl’s sleep indicates her strong and wise personality, with which she can easily get out of any crisis or problem without anything harming her. Many prominent jurists also said in interpretation that seeing frequent urination While an unmarried woman is sleeping, it is evidence that she is entering into a love story with a young man who has many distinctive qualities that will make her close to him in a short period. time. Their relationship will end with many good things happening. Interpretation of a dream about urinating a lot for a married woman: Seeing a married woman urinating a lot in a dream means that she will bear many problems and heavy life pressures and always try to get rid of them without any of her family members knowing. Whereas if a married woman sees that she is urinating a lot in Her dream, this is a sign that God (Glory be to Him) will fill her life with many blessings and gifts and open wide doors to gain...

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking with the dead during the day

preview.html: This indicator is placed based on the uncle of the deceased and in the dream, once something is received or given, so we will highlight these indicators, which are also given based on the circumstances of the dreamer, as we will give the interpretation of the dream of the dead walking with the living, the interpretation of the dream of the dead walking with the living for free. Interpretation of seeing walking with dead people during the day in a dream for a single girl. Some interpretations see that walking next to a dead person in a dream is an expression of the joy and happiness that will be present in the dreamer’s life. In the event that you are single, it could be marriage or engagement with a good person. In the event that it goes An unmarried woman sleeps with a dead person during the day and trembles in fear of that person. The dream expresses that the unmarried woman does unacceptable things and causes her many crises. If the unmarried woman walks with the deceased, and it is night, then the dream expresses the difficulty that the girl finds In completing her studies and duties. If an unmarried woman walks with the dead within the borders of her home. The dream was interpreted as meaning that the girl does not want to get married now, but rather prefers a single life to marriage. The joy of walking alone in her sleep with the dead, and she knew that the dream was an expression of her longing for that person. And her desire to see him. If an unmarried woman continues to walk with the deceased to her living area and until she enters the house, this is different from what one of the suitors presented. If an unmarried girl sees that she is walking with a dead man in her dream, with her ability to remember the time of the walk or other Clear signs. The dream shows the coming happiness of this girl. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the dead returning to life for single people. Interpretation of the testimony of walking with the dead during the day in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman walking next to a dead man in her dream, and that was during the day, but she was happy about it. Fidel means purity This lady’s morals and kindness to everyone around her. It can be said that a married woman walks with a dead person in a dream. Evidence that the financial situation of the married woman is going well, and that there is no hardship in this regard. If the married woman walks with the deceased without seeing his face or... She knows who he is. The dream was an indication that he did not visit her or ask about her family and that she is not related to her, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams that she is walking with the dead, even though she cannot leave the dead and escape from him, then the dream indicates happiness and nourishment. Interpretation Seeing a woman walking with the dead during the day in a dream for a divorced woman. Of course, a divorced woman suffers from countless problems and crises, whether they are from her ex-husband or from those around her, and if she sees in a dream that she is walking with a dead body in broad daylight, the dream shows her ability to solve these problems and put an end to these problems. Crises. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is walking with a dead person, and this dead person gives her a gift and takes it from him. The dream indicates that her situation will change for the better, which may be represented by joining a new job. If a divorced woman dreams that a dead person visits her home and her ex-husband welcomes her. Regardless of Dreaming about the possibility of his ex-husband returning to her, and God knows best. title: The meaning of seeing a mother in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of seeing a mother in a dream: This vision suggests many different meanings. Ibn Sirin also said that seeing a mother in a dream indicates life because the mother’s status is excellent in real life. You will not find any woman doing what a mother does for her children because this is what we explain in this article. It is one of the most important interpretations mentioned in many books of interpretation by one of the most famous imams of interpretation, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Read also: The toilet in a dream, the meaning of seeing a mother in a dream, the meaning of seeing a mother in a dream. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Also, the meaning of seeing a mother in a dream indicates To many strong connotations that we learn about below, according to what Ibn Sirin reported in the book Interpretation of Dreams, and below are the most important interpretations, which are as follows: Ibn Sirin said: Seeing a mother in a dream is a praiseworthy vision. As it indicates goodness, blessing, tenderness and warmth that characterizes the dreamer. Seeing a mother in a dream indicates the dreamer’s nostalgia for the days of childhood. To escape from the worries, sorrows, and problems in which he lives. The personality of the mother in reality also affects the dreamer. There he sees the mother as she really is, and if she has the strength, she will appear like this in the dream. Read more: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a naked woman in a dream. The meaning of seeing a mother in a dream for a pregnant woman. There are some dreams that many people stop at while looking for money. Is this the meaning of this dream or what does it indicate? Perhaps one of these dreams is seeing a mother in a dream, so we explain below the interpretation of this vision for a pregnant woman, which is as follows: If a pregnant woman sees her mother in a dream, this indicates her desire to see her child. It also indicates that the birth process is easy as the woman does not feel much distress. Pain and fatigue during childbirth. It also indicates the approaching date of birth, and God knows best. Read also: Washing the dead. The meaning of seeing a mother in a dream for a married woman. As we mentioned previously, seeing a mother in a dream indicates many interpretations that can have good and bad meanings, depending on the situation. Seeing: If a married woman sees her mother in a dream and is suffering from some marital strife. This is evidence of the collapse of worries and sorrows and the improvement of her conditions with her husband. If a married woman dreams that she is kissing her mother’s hand. This indicates the stability and blessings that this woman experiences. It also indicates stability Married life and understanding between her and her husband. It also symbolizes a change in her marital life for the better. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream What does it mean to see a dead mother alive? Also, after having previously learned about many interpretations about the meaning of seeing a mother in a dream, we learn here about Interpretation of seeing a dead mother alive in a dream, as this dream indicates the mother’s position in the afterlife, as well as in the place of the real mother, where she is in his class, and the living witnesses, with their souls with God, mean overcoming difficulties in life and improving material and health conditions . The life of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream for a man: When a man sees and

title: Dream interpretation of seeing drowning in a dream for a single woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing yourself drowning in a dream: There is no doubt that drowning is one of the worst things that can happen to a person when swimming in the sea, pool, or otherwise. It is worth noting that drowning is death resulting from suffocation in water or other liquids. Seeing yourself drowning in a dream is considered one of the visions that deserve praise or disavowal, and many interpretation scholars, including Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen, have interpreted this vision and many interpretations, interpretations, and meanings of it, and through it. In the following article, we will give you the interpretation of a dream about seeing yourself drowning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing yourself drowning in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin is considered one of the famous scholars of interpretation, and it is worth noting that he interpreted the dream of seeing yourself drowning in a dream as follows: Ibn Sirin explains that seeing a student In a dream about drowning in the sea or a pond, this vision is a sign of success and excellence in study and obtaining a high academic qualification. It is also interpreted that seeing a person in a dream falling into a pond and drowning in it is evidence that the dreamer will be affected by something bad. He said that seeing a person drowning in Black water in a dream is a sign that he will marry an unsuitable woman from whom he will be harmed. Also, seeing a person in his dream drowning in his house is evidence of the many problems and crises that the dreamer suffers from in reality. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a projectile in a dream for an unmarried woman and a woman. Married in Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing yourself drowning in a dream in Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi, who is one of the scholars of interpretation, will interpret the dream of seeing yourself drowning in a dream, and he said that it has many different meanings and connotations, including: Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a person drowning in a pool in a dream means that the dreamer He commits sins in reality and his life will be difficult. Also, if one sees in a dream that his brother is drowning in a swimming pool, this means that the dreamer intends to do something bad or that this bad will actually happen to him. If the dreamer sees in a dream that there is a child drowning, then this Evidence that the dreamer is suffering from an unstable life. As for seeing a dead person in a dream escaping from drowning, this vision is evidence that the dead person is in a better condition, but if he did not survive drowning, this indicates his need to beg and give zakat. Also, dreaming of a person drowning in A small pond is a sign of problems with his family. Seeing someone drowning in turbid water in a dream means that he will be exposed to major problems. Interpretation of the dream of seeing yourself drowning in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dream of seeing drowning in a dream, which may differ from some interpretations and explanations. Which was suggested by other interpreters, and the interpretations came as follows: If a fortuneteller sees himself drowning in a dream, this vision indicates that he is far from God because of the forbidden actions that he performs. But if a person sees in a dream that he has escaped drowning, this indicates that he He achieved his goals and fulfilled his ambitions, because surviving drowning is good news and abundant in the dreamer’s livelihood. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing someone arguing with him talking to me in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams about drowning in...

title: Interpretation of the appearance of the name Saad in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the name Saad in a dream: A person is distinguished by a name that will accompany him throughout his life, and his parents call him by the name of his birth, so that they name him, but also separation from brothers means happiness for a person to enjoy and the name Saad is one of the ancient Arabic names and the name is considered contradictory in its meaning with misery and sadness, so what is the interpretation? Seeing the name Saad in a dream. Interpretation of the appearance of the name Saad in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The name Saad is considered one of the names that generate optimism, as it is a sign of happiness and joy. This name is for males, not females. If you see this name in a dream, this indicates the happiness that this person experiences: Whoever sees this dream will be blessed abundantly, and a lot of goodness in his life, when he sees the name Saad in a dream. A pregnant woman is also liberated from the difficulties she faced in her pregnancy and her birth is easy without difficulties. Likewise A married man is blessed with good children, who are righteous to him and to their mother. He is also blessed with kindness and abundance in his life, and earns a lot of money from the business he works in. Moreover, an unmarried young man is associated with a girl of good morals and lives with her happily. In addition to that, An unmarried girl will soon marry a good young man and live with him firmly and lovingly. A divorced woman will also get rid of the worries and problems she suffered from and live in peace. Moreover, a married woman will receive a lot of money as an inheritance when she sees the name Saad in her dream. See also: Interpretation of seeing a building It breaks down in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of the appearance of the name Saad for a married woman. The name Saad is one of the names given to a man, but seeing this name in a married woman’s dream has great importance, as it is a sign of the happiness that the woman feels and the confidence that she gains in her life: A married woman lives with Her husband is happily and steadily when she sees the name Saad in her dream. He also provides good offspring, and they are fair and just with him. Aside from the end of the conflicts of this woman’s life, she lives in peace and happiness with her family members and family. In addition, this woman has a pregnancy soon , especially if she is expecting this pregnancy. Also, the gender of this baby is male when she sees the name Saad in a dream. Moreover, the woman gets a lot of money and benefits in her life. She also gets nice skin that makes her heart happy, and changes her life for the better and better. See also: Interpretation of a dream about twins for someone who does not have twins in a dream. Seeing the name Saad in a dream for a man. The name Saad raises optimism when heard because it is a name that indicates happiness and it appears in the man’s dream that life becomes easier and easier after the torment he suffered. Here are the most important interpretations related to this vision: God compensates a person for what he has experienced in his life, so that he can live in happiness, stability, and peace of mind. Likewise, his friends are good, when he sees a person named Saad in a dream, this is a sign of protecting his friends. He also marries a woman who is good to him, and lives with her in stability and happiness. Moreover, If he is married, he will soon have a son and will be fair to him. Also, changes are taking place in his life, which are...

title: Learn about the interpretation of nails in a dream from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about putting nails

preview.html: Many girls care about their nails and always want to add the best types of nail polish. Changing the color of nails usually symbolizes a health problem, so it is natural that seeing nails in a dream has many connotations and meanings, and today we will point out the most important of them according to what major commentators mentioned. Nails in a dream Interpretation Dreaming about nails is evidence of the dreamer’s behavior. If the nails are well-groomed and have thin edges, this indicates that the dreamer is upright and has good morals. However, if the nails are dirty and unkempt, then this indicates rude morals. But if the nails in the dream look good and elegant. In a sick person’s dream, this is evidence that he will recover soon and enjoy health, well-being, and a long life. However, if the nails are very fragile and have many scratches and wounds, this indicates that the dreamer cannot overcome his current poor health condition, and it may be the cause of his death, and God knows best. Seeing very brittle nails with many scratches in a man’s dream means that he will be exposed to accumulating debts, and nail ulcers symbolize dismissal from work. Great wealth. Nails in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Very hard nails in a dream symbolize that the dreamer needs more sacrifices and puts in a lot of effort to be able to realize his dreams and ultimately achieve his goals. And God knows best. As for whoever dreams that he is filing his nails in a dream, this is evidence that he will be able to get rid of the problems that dominate his life at the present time and that he will also be able to forget the past with all its sorrows. And pains, every relationship is always reckless. As for whoever dreams that he paints his nails an attractive color, this indicates that he will face many good days in which he will find the fulfillment of all his dreams and achieve his goals that he has always worked for in the previous years. His death, and God knows best. Looking at short nails, as the scholar Ibn Sirin explained that the dreamer will gain benefit for himself and those around him in the coming days. Nails in a single woman’s dream. Seeing nails in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she will be associated with a person with high morals and skill in dealing in the coming days. On the other hand, she is an ambitious person who always wants to reach the highest positions. Scratches in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate that she will be associated with a corrupt person who will make her life hell, and it is better for her to end the relationship before she reaches marriage. Neat and organized nails in a woman’s dream indicate that she will take many positive steps in the coming period of her life and will be able to achieve her goals, If she is looking for a job, the dream indicates that you will find a suitable job opportunity. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just write: Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. What is the interpretation of a dream about cutting nails? For single women? Seeing nails cut in one dream indicates enjoying good morals, good behavior among people, and prosperity. Interprets Ibn
